channel.title: CVE Feed for Fahad Mahmood -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fahad Mahmood -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35696|2024-07-01T21:26:43.708Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- wp%20docs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood WP Docs allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Docs: from n/a through 2.1.3.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood WP Docs allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Docs: from n/a through 2.1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-35695|2024-06-10T17:41:09.474Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- wp%20docs
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood WP Docs allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Docs: from n/a through 2.1.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31294|2024-06-10T14:14:27.240Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- wp%20sort%20order
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood WP Sort Order.This issue affects WP Sort Order: from n/a through 1.3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32690|2024-06-04T17:52:12.238Z -- fahad%20mahmood -- rss%20feed%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Fahad Mahmood RSS Feed Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects RSS Feed Widget: from n/a through 2.9.7.
